long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Need to forward many Gmail messages over to someone? This is a quick way to select all the emails you'd like forwarded, and send them off to 1 recipient with a click of a button. 

Even if you close your Gmail, browser, or even your PC, everything will still forward over as though you spent your time forwarding 1 email at a time.

Need to migrate your account? If you want to migrate an entire Gmail account to another one, you absolutely can-- and in seconds! cloudHQâ€™s Premium plan allows you to do this regardless of how many emails your Gmail account has.

Here's some of our key features:
âœ… Forward Multiple Emails in One Click
âœ… Forward Emails as One PDF attachment
âœ… Forward Emails to Your CRM
âœ… Full and Complete Email Account Migration / Email Transfer
âœ… Forward Emails in Encrypted PDF Format

You now have the ability to forward hundreds to thousands of Gmail messages seamlessly.
And if that wasn't enough, here's 5 more reasons to try it:
ğŸ‘‰ User-Friendly Solution
ğŸ‘ Runs In The Cloud
ğŸ˜‰ Onboarding New Employees is Made Easy
ğŸ’¼ Changing jobs
ğŸ‘ Save Important Emails For Reference

cloudHQ. Helping your Gmail productivity, 1 click at a time.

cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net
Website: https://www.multi-email-forward.com/
Pricing:  https://www.multi-email-forward.com/pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/multi-email-forward/
Support email: support@cloudhq.net
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net

long.nl:
Moet u veel Gmail-berichten doorsturen naar iemand? Dit is een snelle manier om alle e-mails te selecteren die je wilt doorsturen, en ze naar 1 ontvanger te sturen met 1 klik op de knop. 

Zelfs als u uw Gmail, browser of zelfs uw PC sluit, zal alles nog steeds worden doorgestuurd alsof u 1 e-mail per keer hebt doorgestuurd.

Moet u uw account migreren? Als je een compleet Gmail-account naar een ander account wilt migreren, dan kan dat absoluut - en binnen enkele seconden! Het Premium-plan van cloudHQ stelt je in staat dit te doen, ongeacht het aantal e-mails dat je Gmail-account heeft.

Hier zijn enkele van onze belangrijkste functies:
âœ… Stuur meerdere e-mails door met Ã©Ã©n klik

U kunt nu naadloos honderden tot duizenden Gmail-berichten doorsturen.
En alsof dat nog niet genoeg is, zijn hier nog 5 redenen om het te proberen:
ğŸ‘‰ Gebruiksvriendelijke oplossing

Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net
~~~~~~~~~~

Need to forward many Gmail messages over to someone? This is a quick way to select all the emails you'd like forwarded, and send them off to 1 recipient with a click of a button. 

Even if you close your Gmail, browser, or even your PC, everything will still forward over as though you spent your time forwarding 1 email at a time.

Need to migrate your account? If you want to migrate an entire Gmail account to another one, you absolutely can-- and in seconds! cloudHQâ€™s Premium plan allows you to do this regardless of how many emails your Gmail account has.

Here's some of our key features:
âœ… Forward Multiple Emails in One Click
âœ… Forward Emails as One PDF attachment
âœ… Forward Emails to Your CRM
âœ… Full and Complete Email Account Migration / Email Transfer
âœ… Forward Emails in Encrypted PDF Format

You now have the ability to forward hundreds to thousands of Gmail messages seamlessly.
And if that wasn't enough, here's 5 more reasons to try it:
ğŸ‘‰ User-Friendly Solution
ğŸ‘ Runs In The Cloud
ğŸ˜‰ Onboarding New Employees is Made Easy
ğŸ’¼ Changing jobs
ğŸ‘ Save Important Emails For Reference

cloudHQ. Helping your Gmail productivity, 1 click at a time.

Website: https://www.multi-email-forward.com/
Pricing:  https://www.multi-email-forward.com//pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/multi-email-forward/
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net

Need to forward many Gmail messages over to someone? This is a quick way to select all the emails you'd like forwarded, and send them off to 1 recipient with a click of a button. 

Even if you close your Gmail, browser, or even your PC, everything will still forward over as though you spent your time forwarding 1 email at a time.

Need to migrate your account? If you want to migrate an entire Gmail account to another one, you absolutely can-- and in seconds! cloudHQâ€™s Premium plan allows you to do this regardless of how many emails your Gmail account has.

Here's some of our key features:
âœ… Forward Multiple Emails in One Click
âœ… Forward Emails as One PDF attachment
âœ… Forward Emails to Your CRM (we will preserve all metadata like sender, bcc, etc.)
âœ… Full and Complete Gmail Account Migration / Email Transfer
âœ… Forward Emails in Encrypted PDF Format
âœ… Forward All Gmail Messages in a Label
âœ… Migrate/Transfer All Gmail Messages in a Label

You now have the ability to forward hundreds to thousands of Gmail messages seamlessly.
And if that wasn't enough, here's 5 more reasons to try it:
